[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#000000″ use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_stops=”rgba(9,19,30,0.85) 0%|rgba(9,19,30,0.85) 100%” background_color_gradient_overlays_image=”on” background_color_gradient_start=”rgba(9,19,30,0.85)” background_color_gradient_end=”rgba(9,19,30,0.85)” background_image=”https://rosengroup.ca/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/dentist_header-bg.jpg” custom_padding=”120px||120px||false|false” custom_css_main_element=”background-position: 50% 32%;” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”||8px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

DEntists

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” text_orientation=”center” background_layout=”dark” max_width=”550px” max_width_tablet=”500px” max_width_phone=”” max_width_last_edited=”on|tablet” module_alignment=”center” module_alignment_tablet=”center” module_alignment_phone=”” module_alignment_last_edited=”on|desktop” global_colors_info=”{}”]

You Know Dentistry, We Know Dentists

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row column_structure=”3_5,2_5″ make_equal=”on” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”3_5″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”45bda54e-96c3-41cf-a663-5af8a7714565″ header_2_font_size=”32px” max_width=”600px” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]

As dentists you know what it takes to excel at the highest level.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider divider_weight=”2px” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” width=”200px” custom_margin=”30px||||false|false” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

You’ve put in the hard work and the results are personally satisfying and financially rewarding. The path you’ve chosen has challenges and you alone know the energy you’ve put into achieving your professional goal. The ultimate satisfaction? Knowing that you have the power to protect not just the people in the community who depend on you, but also everything you’ve worked so hard for.

Your profession is more than a job, it’s a calling to help others insure their health and wellbeing. When you go to work your clients depend on you to make their lives better. Now it’s time to do the same for yourself and the staff who go the extra mile for you. Your practice is more than a daily routine, it’s a reliable resource your community depends upon.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”2_5″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#F7F7F7″ custom_padding=”30px|3%|30px|3%|false|true” custom_css_main_element=”display: -webkit-box;||display: -ms-flexbox;||display: flex;||-webkit-box-orient: vertical;||-webkit-box-direction: normal;||-ms-flex-direction: column;|| flex-direction: column;||-webkit-box-pack: center;||-ms-flex-pack: center;|| justify-content: center;” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”93345947-f191-46db-8752-0103e26d6920″ text_orientation=”center” max_width=”325px” max_width_tablet=”100%” max_width_phone=”” max_width_last_edited=”on|tablet” module_alignment=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Our team is dedicated to contributing to your financial success. We find solutions to help you achieve your financial plans and goals while recognizing the changes that life can bring.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF9saW5rX3VybF9wYWdlIiwic2V0dGluZ3MiOnsicG9zdF9pZCI6IjM4OCJ9fQ==@” button_text=”Work With Us” button_alignment=”center” _builder_version=”4.16″ _dynamic_attributes=”button_url” _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”30px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”60px||||false|false” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”45bda54e-96c3-41cf-a663-5af8a7714565″ header_2_font_size=”32px” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Are you getting back as much as you give?

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider divider_weight=”2px” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” width=”200px” custom_margin=”30px||||false|false” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Safeguarding your practice is important for your financial wellbeing—do you have the time needed to ensure this happens? Your job is to protect your patient’s health, our job is to help you protect your financial health. Taxes and excessive portfolio management fees can take more from your financial base than you want. No matter what stage of the journey you’re at—building your practice, watching it thrive, or planning to retire, our tailored financial plans for dentists will either help you validate your financial strategy or reveal gaps that need to be addressed. Our advisor-client relationship is based on tax efficiency and wealth management at its apex. You put your patients first. At Rosen Group Private Wealth Management, we put clients like you first.

We’ll work with you and your team of professionals to create, implement and manage a plan focused on the needs of your practice as well as your personal goals and dreams.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ make_equal=”on” module_id=”advice” _builder_version=”4.27.4″ _module_preset=”default” Comprehensive Financial Plan

Dentist Financial Checklist: Financial Security & Wealth Building

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” background_enable_color=”off” custom_padding=”1px|30px|30px|30px|false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

As a dentist your focus is on taking care of your patients. At Rosen Group Private Wealth Management our focus is making sure you have the information and the tools needed to take care of your financial portfolio.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”#advice” button_text=”Read More” button_alignment=”left” module_class=”simple-text-button divioverlay-934″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”237bc5d5-577e-4325-8acc-1d0169a83132″ positioning=”absolute” position_origin_a=”bottom_left” vertical_offset=”30px” horizontal_offset=”30px” z_index=”2″ horizontal_offset_tablet=”60px” horizontal_offset_phone=”” horizontal_offset_last_edited=”on|tablet” position_origin_a_tablet=”bottom_center” position_origin_a_phone=”” position_origin_a_last_edited=”on|desktop” position_origin_f_tablet=”” position_origin_f_phone=”” position_origin_f_last_edited=”on|tablet” position_origin_r_tablet=”” position_origin_r_phone=”” position_origin_r_last_edited=”on|tablet” positioning_tablet=”” positioning_phone=”” positioning_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ disabled_on=”on|on|on” _builder_version=”4.27.4″ _module_preset=”3ed5c77d-34ab-4102-86b0-2f9c834481af” disabled=”on” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.27.4″ _module_preset=”default” width=”100%” width_tablet=”100%” width_phone=”100%” max_width=”100%” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.27.4″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][dsm_card_carousel autoplay=”off” slide_to_show_tablet=”2″ slide_to_show_phone=”1″ slide_to_show_last_edited=”on|phone” _builder_version=”4.27.4″ _module_preset=”c3e5cc2b-9508-4b8b-b9c4-b78b40f59978″ global_colors_info=”{}”][dsm_card_carousel_child title=”Dr. John Ormond and Dr. Jean Kavanagh” subtitle=”Dentists” button_url_new_window=”1″ _builder_version=”4.27.4″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” parent_button=”off” parent_header_level=”h4″]

We joined the Rosen Group after a very disappointing 10 years plus with our bank. The difference has been remarkable. They listened to our needs and tailored our plan accordingly. We feel we are in capable hands now but even more importantly we feel they have our best interests at hand. Every person on the Rosen team has been equally professional and friendly. We feel confident recommending this group to all our friends and colleagues.

[/dsm_card_carousel_child][dsm_card_carousel_child title=”Dr. John Ormond and Dr. Jean Kavanagh” subtitle=”Dentists” button_url_new_window=”1″ _builder_version=”4.27.4″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” parent_button=”off” parent_header_level=”h4″]

excerpt.rendered: DEntistsYou Know Dentistry, We Know DentistsAs dentists you know what it takes to excel at the highest level.You’ve put in the hard work and the results are personally satisfying and financially rewarding. The path you’ve chosen has challenges and you alone know the energy you’ve put into achieving your professional goal. The ultimate satisfaction? Knowing that you have the power to protect not just the people in the community who depend on you, but also everything you’ve worked so hard for. Your profession is more than a job, it’s a calling to help others insure their health and wellbeing. When you go to work your clients depend on you to make their lives better. Now it’s time to do the same for yourself and the staff who go the extra mile for you. Your practice is more than a daily routine, it’s a reliable resource your community depends upon.Our team is dedicated to contributing to your financial success. We find solutions to help you achieve your financial plans and goals while recognizing the changes that life can bring.Are you getting back as much as you give?Safeguarding your practice is important for your financial wellbeing—do you have the time needed to […]
